primevc.gui.effects.IEffect

type
interface
implements
primevc.core.traits.IClonable<IEffect>
primevc.core.traits.IInvalidatable
primevc.core.traits.IDisposable

Instance Variables

autoHideFilters(default,setAutoHideFilters) : Bool

Flag indicating if the target's filters should be hidden when the effect is running.

delay(default,setDelay) : Int

Number of milliseconds to wait before starting the effect

duration(default,setDuration) : Int

Effect duration

easing(default,setEasing) : Easing

The easing type that the effect should use

Instance Methods

setValues(v : EffectProperties) : Void

see
EffectProperties
Method to set the explicit start and end values of the effect
